page.title: 05Clubs in South Bradford.
page.content: There are many clubs,for both children and adults,within our block.There are the usual clubs such as{scouts}and {guides}for the young and{sports}clubs for all ages.Two of the faster growing clubs for young people seem to be the {majorettes}and the{computer}clubs. There are several sports grounds in the area available for clubs and two indoor sports centres.Being on the fringe of the city of Bradford there are some large open spaces and two such areas are occupied by two{golf} clubs.Because of the{tragic fire at {the Bradford City ground}the club will have to play its next seasons matches in our area at{Odsal Stadium}which is now being improved in order to be used as a stadium for National and International Speedway Championships. Bradford Northern Rugby League Club also play at this ground.
